column5: Anyone interested in Perch, right now 64 FTW off Serkston. Look for the boats.    Drift till you find them. Plus anyone here fishing the one day Cat derby tomorrow in Dunnville at Steve's place. Meet you there if your in.
I was out last week on Erie caught about 25 nice big perch. Dave I will be fishing cats Saturday night,I have a charter. Also pick up some nice salmon off grimsby in 20 fow today
